title: Tom Yum Koong
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Thai, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An eat-in, take-out and delivery Thai restaurant with an accommodating staff. There is a good selection of veggie/vegan items listed on the menu, but in addition, the menu also generally specifies vegetarian upon request. Also has a location in Arlington, MA.
